Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on tracks near Harlem (Forest Park Branch). Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Harlem (Forest Park Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
